Class CaloriesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mypedometer.pip.pedometer.data.storage.CaloriesManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeakingTimer.Listener, StepListener
    public class CaloriesManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements StepListener, SpeakingTimer.Listener
    This class calculates and displays the approximate calories burned.
